name: Clown Blaster
description:
Blast evil clowns with a cannon. Made for the 1-Bit Clicker game jam.

Scroll the mouse wheel to aim. Left-click to shoot.

If using the .zip file, the data.win file is required to run the game.

I ran into some issues when testing the installer. If it asks you to browse for a file after installed, hit browse and it should take you to the install directory, where you can then choose the .exe file.

If you like the game—as short as it may be—please leave some feedback in the comments. Donations are always welcome too ;)

You can follow me on twitter at @tweetbarf
